TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContainerControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 提供控制項的設計工具功能，這些控制項包含可在設計階段修改的子控制項或屬性。

span.span: Provides designer functionality for controls that contain child controls or properties that can be modified at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供基底設計工具類別可以修改設計介面的控制項。The class provides a base designer class for controls that can be modified on the design surface. 這包括包含可編輯的內部屬性或子控制項的控制項。This includes controls that contain child controls or editable inner properties. 提供單一框架的區域來代表控制項，並會自動處理在設計階段呈現控制項。The provides a single framed region to represent the control, and automatically handles rendering the control at design time. 套用屬性相關聯的控制項，來決定的設計階段行為。Apply the attribute on the associated control to determine the design-time behavior of the . 套用相關聯的控制項上的設定，如下所示：Apply the settings on the associated control as follows: - `false` 表示代表子控制項的設計可編輯區域內容。`false` to indicate that the represents the contents of the editable design region as child controls. - `true` 表示可編輯設計區域的內容表示為可編輯的控制項的內部屬性。`true` to indicate that the represents the contents of the editable design region as editable inner properties of the control. 控制項開發人員可以衍生，並擴充自訂的設計工具從一個基底設計工具開發，控制項類型而定，如下列清單中所定義：Control developers can derive and extend a custom designer from one of several base designers depending on the kind of control that is being developed, as defined in the following list: - 允許要在設計階段加入至它的子控制項的控制項可以衍生自類別。Controls that allow child controls to be added to it at design time can derive from the class. 例如，類別衍生自類別，並代表設計介面上的控制項。For example, the class is derived from the class and represents a control on the design surface. - 有一個或多個子控制項，並可能也有可編輯的設計工具區域，其中在設計階段加入控制項的控制項可以衍生自類別。Controls that have one or more child controls, and might also have an editable designer region where controls can be added at design time, can derive from the class. - 需要自訂的設計階段處理可以衍生自基底控制項類別。Controls that require custom design-time processing can derive from the base class. > [!NOTE] > 類別會取代過時類別。The class replaces the obsolete class. 使用相關聯的自訂設計工具類別，以及自訂控制項實作的屬性。Use the attribute to associate a custom designer class together with a custom control implementation. 如需如何使用自訂控制項的控制項設計工具的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立基本的控制項設計工具的 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/27e44af0-6e12-4b7d-b17f-db35f1b6a052)。For detailed information about how to use control designers with custom controls, see [Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/27e44af0-6e12-4b7d-b17f-db35f1b6a052). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生從設計工具類別類別。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a designer class from the class. 此範例會定義衍生自的簡單控制項類別，並再定義關聯的設計工具，衍生自類別。The example defines a simple control that is derived from the class, and then defines an associated designer, which is derived from the class. 設計工具的衍生的類別覆寫和屬性，以自訂的設計介面上的控制項的可編輯區域周圍的框架。The derived designer class overrides the and properties to customize the frame that is around the editable region of the control on the design surface. [!code-csharp[SimpleContainerControlDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleContainerControlDesigner/CS/simplecontainercontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SimpleContainerControlDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleContainerControlDesigner/VB/simplecontainercontrol.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void AddDesignTimeCssAttributes (System.Collections.IDictionary styleAttributes);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddDesignTimeCssAttributes(class System.Collections.IDictionary styleAttributes) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub AddDesignTimeCssAttributes (styleAttributes As IDictionary)
protected: virtual void AddDesignTimeCssAttributes(System::Collections::IDictionary ^ styleAttributes);

param.name: styleAttributes
param.span: 樣式屬性的索引鍵集合。

span.span: A keyed collection of style attributes.

summary.span: 在設計階段中加入控制項的樣式屬性。

span.span: Adds the style attributes for the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將一組控制項的設計階段表示法的樣式屬性。The method adds a set of style attributes for the design-time representation of the control. 樣式屬性值會加入至`styleAttributes`樣式屬性名稱來做為索引鍵的集合。The style attribute values are added to the `styleAttributes` collection, keyed by the style attribute name. 例如，您可以存取做為集合中的高度值`styleAttributes["height"]`C# 或`styleAttributes("height")`for Microsoft Visual Basic。For example, you can access the height value in the collection as `styleAttributes["height"]` for C# or `styleAttributes("height")` for Microsoft Visual Basic. 如果相關聯的控制項不衍生自類別方法不會加入屬性的值即可`styleAttributes`集合。If the associated control is not derived from the class, the method does not add attribute values to the `styleAttributes` collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool AllowResize { get; }
.property instance bool AllowResize
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AllowResize As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AllowResize { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否可在設計階段中調整控制項的大小。

span.span: Gets a value indicating if the control can be resized at design time.

value.span: 如果可以調整控制項大小則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: , if the control can be resized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底實作屬性會傳回`true`。The base implementation for the property returns `true`. 這表示設計工具支援設計介面上的控制項調整大小。This indicates that the designer supports resizing of the control on the design surface.

para.span: 類別衍生自類別可以覆寫屬性，指出設計工具不支援在設計介面上的控制項調整大小。

span.span: Classes that are derived from the class can override the property to indicate that the designer does not support resizing of the control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string FrameCaption { get; }
.property instance string FrameCaption
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property FrameCaption As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ FrameCaption { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得在設計階段中針對控制項所顯示的標題。

span.span: Gets the caption that is displayed for a control at design time.

value.span: 如果控制項具有設計階段標題，則為設計階段中用於控制項框架標題的字串，否則為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The string used for the control frame caption at design time, if the control has a design-time caption; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字串是顯示在設計介面上的控制項的可編輯區域周圍框架的標題。The string is the caption that is displayed in the frame around the editable region of the control on the design surface. 預設標題框架是設計工具的執行個體的屬性。The default caption for a frame is the property of the designer instance. 這通常是執行階段相同控制項的屬性。This is typically the same as the run-time property of the control.

para.span: 您也可以衍生自控制項設計工具設定不同的畫面格標題類別，而且然後覆寫屬性。

span.span: You can set a different frame caption for a control designer by deriving a class from the class, and then overriding the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style FrameStyle { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style FrameStyle
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property FrameStyle As Style
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ FrameStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得在設計階段中套用至控制項框架的樣式。

span.span: Gets the style that is applied to the control frame at design time.

value.span: 設計階段中控制項框架的 。

span.span: A for the control frame at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出設計介面上的控制項的可編輯區域周圍框架的樣式屬性。The property indicates the style properties of the frame around the editable region of the control on the design surface.

para.span: 衍生的類別時類別，覆寫屬性來變更框架，例如框線、 前景色彩、 背景色彩和標題的字型設定的屬性。

span.span: When deriving a class from the class, override the property to change the properties of the frame, such as the border, foreground color, background color, and caption font settings.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Collections.IDictionary GetDesignTimeCssAttributes ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IDictionary GetDesignTimeCssAttributes() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetDesignTimeCssAttributes () As IDictionary
public: virtual System::Collections::IDictionary ^ GetDesignTimeCssAttributes();

summary.span: 傳回設計階段中控制項的樣式屬性集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of style attributes for the control at design time.

returns.span: 會套用至設計介面上的控制項的一組樣式屬性集合。

span.span: A collection of style attributes applied to the control on the design surface.

returns.span: 樣式屬性名稱是用來存取 中樣式屬性值的索引鍵。

span.span: The style attribute names are keys used to access the style attribute values in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回控制項的設計階段表示法的樣式屬性的集合。The method returns a collection of style attributes for the design-time representation of the control. 若要檢查的樣式屬性值的控制項在設計階段，使用的樣式屬性名稱當做所傳回之集合的索引鍵。To examine a style attribute value at design time for a control, use the style attribute name as a key to the returned collection. 樣式屬性值會儲存為集合中的字串。Style attribute values are stored as strings in the collection. 例如，您可以存取做為集合中的高度值`styleAttributes["height"]`C# 或`styleAttributes("height")`for Microsoft Visual Basic。For example, you can access the height value in the collection as `styleAttributes["height"]` for C# or `styleAttributes("height")` for Microsoft Visual Basic. 如果相關聯的控制項不衍生自類別方法會傳回空集合。If the associated control is not derived from the class, the method returns an empty collection.

para.span: 預設實作方法來初始化樣式屬性集合方法。

span.span: The default implementation for the method initializes the style attribute collection by using the method.

para.span: 若要操作衍生自控制項設計工具中的樣式類別，覆寫方法。

span.span: To manipulate styles in a control designer that are derived from the class, override the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string GetDesignTimeHtml (System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml (regions As DesignerRegionCollection) As String
public: override System::String ^ GetDesignTimeHtml(System::Web::UI::Design::DesignerRegionCollection ^ regions);

span.span: A collection of designer regions.

summary.span: 傳回用來在設計階段表示控制項的 HTML 標記 (Markup)。

span.span: Returns the HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: 代表控制項的 HTML 標記字串。

span.span: An HTML markup string that represents the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來取得控制項的 HTML。Use the method to get the HTML for the control. 呈現使用其關聯的控制項設計工具可編輯設計區域中所包含的子控制項。Child controls that are contained in the editable design region are rendered using their associated control designers. 方法初始化新物件相關聯的控制項，然後再傳回的可編輯區域到區域`regions`集合。The method initializes a new object for the editable region of associated control, and then returns the region through the `regions` collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string GetEditableDesignerRegionContent (System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetEditableDesignerRegionContent(class System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetEditableDesignerRegionContent (region As EditableDesignerRegion) As String
public: override System::String ^ GetEditableDesignerRegionContent(System::Web::UI::Design::EditableDesignerRegion ^ region);

param.name: region
param.span: 控制項中包含的可編輯設計區域。

span.span: An editable design region contained within the control.

summary.span: 傳回設計階段中控制項可編輯區域的內容。

span.span: Returns the content for the editable region of the control at design time.

returns.span: 中包含區域的保存內容。

span.span: The persisted content of the region contained within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作單一的設計工具區域，而不是設計工具區域的集合。The class implements a single designer region instead of a collection of designer regions. 因此，`region`參數已忽略，而方法會傳回包含單一設計工具區域的內容控制項設計工具中。Therefore, the `region` parameter is ignored, and the method returns the content for the single designer region that is contained in the control designer.

public: override System::String ^ GetPersistenceContent();

summary.span: 在設計階段傳回控制項的永續性內容。

span.span: Returns the persistable content of the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回`null`表示類別沒有持續性的內部內容。The method returns `null` to indicate that the class does not have persisted inner content.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(class System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (region As EditableDesignerRegion, content As String)
public: override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(System::Web::UI::Design::EditableDesignerRegion ^ region, System::String ^ content);

param.name: region
param.span: 控制項中包含的可編輯設計區域。

span.span: An editable design region contained within the control.

param.name: content
param.span: 要指派給可編輯設計區域的內容。

span.span: Content to assign for the editable design region.

summary.span: 設定設計階段中，控制項可編輯區域的內容。

span.span: Sets the content for the editable region of the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作單一的設計工具區域，而不是設計工具區域的集合。The class implements a single designer region instead of a collection of designer regions. 因此，`region`參數已忽略，而方法會設定為包含單一設計工具區域的內容控制項設計工具中。Therefore, the `region` parameter is ignored, and the method sets the content for the single designer region that is contained in the control designer.
